title: Family of Erin Patterson’s victims say mushroom trial media frenzy fed off their suffering | The Weekly Beast
summary: Heather and Ian Wilkinson's daughter expresses outrage over their family's tragedy being exploited for entertainment purposes. She describes the experience as "revolting." Additionally, the update mentions Andrew Greene receiving a second chance in his life or career.

title: Nine demands Bob Katter apologise for ‘aggressive behaviour’ towards reporter and considers legal action
summary: A media company is considering defamation action after independent MP accused reporter Josh Bavas of being 'a racist' for questioning Katter's Lebanese heritage. The incident has sparked a debate on journalistic standards and political accountability. The media company defends its reporter's inquiry as legitimate.

title: RFK Jr ally chosen to lead CDC as departing officials hit out at vaccine messaging – as it happened
summary: Deputy Health Secretary Jim O'Neill has been appointed as the interim director of the CDC. This change comes as CDC staff members show support for officials who have recently resigned. The blog reporting on this news has now concluded.
